pageSubtitle: My educational journey and professional certifications

studies.title: React Challenge Certificate (HackerRank)
studies.description: I completed a 1-hour technical challenge on the HackerRank platform, focused on React development. During the test, I demonstrated skills in component creation, state management, event management, and performance optimization in dynamic web applications. This certificate validates my ability to solve practical problems in a time-limited environment.

studies.title: Responsive Web Design Mastery with Tailwind CSS
studies.description: Throughout this course, I gained a solid understanding of Tailwind CSS, a modern and utilitarian design framework. I learned how to efficiently create responsive and stylish web interfaces, optimizing both development time and site performance. I used advanced customization techniques and best practices to ensure my projects are visually appealing, accessible, and easy to maintain. This course allowed me to master creating flexible and scalable layouts, tailored to the needs of today's web development.

studies.title: Automated and Manual Software Testing
studies.description: During my training in software testing, I acquired knowledge in both manual and automated testing, using tools such as Selenium and Cypress to ensure the quality and functionality of applications. In addition, I learned to work under agile methodologies such as Scrum, managing development through Jira and participating in the planning and execution of Sprints. My focus is on ensuring an optimal user experience, detecting and resolving errors efficiently.

studies.description: Since April 2024, I have been studying at the School of Development, Campus 42 Barcelona, an innovative environment that promotes self-directed learning through problem solving and collaborative projects, without the traditional structure of teachers or classes. During my training, I have acquired skills in the C and C++ programming languages, in addition to developing skills in system administration, including the installation of virtual machines and advanced command line management.

studies.title: Responsive Web Design
studies.description: Obtained a certificate in Responsive Web Design from freeCodeCamp, covering HTML, CSS, Flexbox, Grid, and accessibility best practices.

studies.title: Ironhack: Tech Bootcamp in Barcelona
studies.description: In the bootcamp, we learned basic and advanced concepts, especially in languages such as HTML5, CSS, JavaScript. We applied our knowledge to real projects that we completed ourselves. We used frontend libraries such as React and Axios to make requests to a backend created with the Express framework in the Node.js execution environment. For data storage, we learned to master MongoDB, as well as handling videos and images in Cloudinary. Finally, we deployed the projects on Vercel. Thanks to this training, I feel empowered to face challenges in the world of software development with confidence.
